titleStmt.title: The holy lives of God's prophets. By J.H.
titleStmt.author: Hoddesdon, John, fl. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Wil: Hope at the blew Anchor on the north side of the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: First leaf = engraved frontispiece depicting Job; final leaf = advertisement.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb. 3"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "3".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
